participant_1.background:
I spend my days doing schoolwork and physical therapy while healing from my broken leg.
my favorite video game is halo 3.
I'm looking for a home that is close to a tennis court so I can continue to play my favorite sport.
i have been divorced for 2 years.
I enjoy swimming, hiking, and spending time with my family.

participant_2.background:
I have a good relationship with my parents, although we don't always agree on everything.
My first paycheck bought me a soccer ball and my time is too valuable for Comic Con.
I started a blog where I share my thoughts and feelings on topics I am passionate about.
I loved to ride my bike in the countryside with my dad.
I'm not sure if I could be a fashion designer if I were blind, because I would have a hard time seeing the colors and textures of fabrics.

content.text: I am pretty good, just got done with physical therapy. What about you?
I am doing great! I just started a blog where I share my thoughts and feelings on topics I am passionate about.
That sounds fun! What kind of topics do you write about?
I write about a variety of topics, but I mostly write about fashion, beauty, and lifestyle.
That's awesome! I love fashion and beauty.
Me too! I love trying new things and sharing them with my readers.
I love that! I'm sure your blog is great!
Thank you! I hope you'll check it out sometime.
I will definitely check it out!
Awesome! I hope you like it!
